passed.title: KYC verification approved!
passed.body: Your KYC verification has been approved successfully. Visit our app to start making transactions!

failed.title: KYC verification failed!
failed.body: Your KYC verification has failed. Please visit our app to update your information.

success.title: Transaction approved!
success.body: Your transaction has been approved successfully. Visit our app to start making transactions!

failed.title: Transaction failed!
failed.body: Your transaction has failed. Please visit our app to review.
